KOUSA: Plume, my old friend! You have returned from your expedition safely!

1
PLUME: It is good to see you well as ever, Kousa! I see you have been working hard to keep the shelves in the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop's</color> stocked full of gravity crystals.
3
2
KOUSA: Your eye is keen! A recent meteor from <color=orange>Hollow's Lantern</color> broke off some tiny pieces of the planet's crust, providing an abundance of material to carve new gravity crystals.
4
3
KOUSA: But what brings you here to my humble workshop today, my friend?
5 4
PLUME: Kousa, do you not recall? You asked me to come to your workshop today to show me an invention of yours.
6 5
PLUME: If I recall correctly, you described it as an invention that would help our expedition team weather the terrible storms on the ocean planet?
7 6
KOUSA: Oh... Yes, yes, of course. I wanted to show you my newest invention! How could I have forgotten? It is right outside!
8 7
KOUSA: The storm shelter generates a gravity field designed to hold Nomai in place, perfect for protecting Nomai when islands are lifted into space.
9 8
KOUSA: This is our first collaboration with the..... The...
10 9
PLUME: The <color=orange>Sunless City?</color>
11 10
KOUSA: Yes, yes! The <color=orange>Sunless City!</color> They kindly shared their technology with us to power this invention.
12 11
KOUSA: Thanks to their contributions, the device can autonomously power itself when the island is launched into orbit, and even deactivates on its own afterwards, conserving power!
13 12
PLUME: How incredible! I must thank our friends from the <color=orange>Sunless City</color> when we next set off for our an expedition together.
14 13
PLUME: And of course, you have my deepest gratitude for your wisdom and hard work engineering this device, Kousa! This device shall make our stay on such a turbulent planet much safer.
15 14
KOUSA: I am proud to do what I can to protect all of you on your journey, my friend.
16 15
KOUSA: Now, why were you here again?
